type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:elytra_flight`
Allows the player to fly as if they had an Elytra equipped.
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

render_elytra.description: Determines whether an Elytra should render on the player's back while this power is active.

texture_location.description: If specified, this will be the texture used by the Elytra granted by this power.
